sense.def:
One's knee
je upogljivi srednji del noge.

Kadar je nekdo ali nekaj
on one's knee
, počiva ali sedi na zgornjem delu naših nog, ko sedimo.

seg.quote: She sat with Marcus by her side and Maria on her knee.

sense.def:
To be on one's knees
pomeni klečati.

seg.quote: Kurt threw himself on his knees.
The woman got up off her knees.

sense.def:
Kadar nekaj
brings a country to its knees
, neko deželo skoraj uniči.

seg.quote: The cost of the war would have brought the kingdom to its knees.
